湁湁湁

湁字的基本解释

湁
chì
〔湁潗（
j?）〕（水）涌起的样子，如“湁湁鼎沸。”

湁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》丑入切，入緝，徹。］
见“湁潗”。

湁字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　湁； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页636第04
【唐韻】丑入切【集韻】敕立切，?音雴。【說文】湁，湒?也。【司馬相如·上林賦】湁潗鼎沸。【郭璞曰】湁潗皆水微轉細湧貌。

湁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
湁字的起名意思

水涌起的样子，如“湁湁鼎沸”。

Shame
Basic explanation of words
Shame
chì
〔湁潗(
j?)] The appearance of (water) surging up, such as "abundance."
Shame
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" is ugly, cut, and thorough. ]
See "湁潗".
Shame
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　湁; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 636 04
【Tang Yun】Ugly cut into the cut 【Ji Yun】Earth cut, the sound of the song. [Said the text] 湁, 湒? Ye. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Happiness. [Guo Pu said] All the water turns finely.

Name meaning
The appearance of the water surging is like "abundance and boiling".
